title: Mahershala Ali
summary: Mahershala Ali (/məˈhɜːrʃələ/; born Mahershalalhashbaz Gilmore, February 16, 1974) is an American actor and rapper who is the recipient of multiple accolades, including two Academy Awards, three Screen Actors Guild Awards, a BAFTA award, a Golden Globe Award and a Primetime Emmy Award. Time magazine named him one of the 100 most influential people in the world in 2019.[2] In 2020, The New York Times ranked him #23 in its list of the 25 Greatest Actors of the 21st Century.[3]
